column2: I got the crunchy eel roll (I'm such a sucker for eel) and it was delicious.  Well packed
column3: not too heavy on the rice and plenty of tobiko.  The hubs got the kobe beef roll which was delicious but a little surprising.  For some reason I assumed it would be raw beef and it was just barely seared (yes
column4: it stated this on the menu
column6: not me).  While the flavor was fantastic and I actually enjoyed the roll a lot
column7: I just love raw beef and think I would've loved it more that way.  He also got a Rock & Roll
column8: but I didn't try it since he added cream cheese to it (blasphemy!) and I just won't support that kind of bastardization of sushi.  :)
